price: 105. Ya sôló, tokitisaki buku epai nayo na bosembo nyoso mpo ete okata na yango likambo na kati kati ya bato na ndenge Allah akolakisa yo. Kasi kozala mosalisi ya bato mabe te.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِتَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِمَآ أَرَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَلَا تَكُن لِّلۡخَآئِنِينَ خَصِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi litaḥkuma bayna al-nāsi bimā arāka al-lahu walā takun lil'khāinīna khaṣīman
